testcase.classname: To validate forget password fuctionality of the facebbok application
testcase.name: To validate forget password
testcase.system-out: Given User have to enters login page through chromebrowser..................passed And User have to click the forget password..................................passed When User have to enter email or mobile number..............................passed Then User have to click the search button...................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Login functionality of the Facebook Application
testcase.name: To validate Login page using invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Facebook login page........................................passed When User have to enter invalid username and valid password.................passed And User click the login button.............................................passed Then User should be in invalid credential page..............................passed

testcase.name: To validate Login page using invalid username and invalid password
